Human: I want to make a pumpkin pie for Thanksgiving, but I've never made one before.  How do I make a pumpkin pie?

Assistant: There are many variations on pumpkin pie recipes, but here’s one of my favorites:

4 eggs

3⁄4 cup pumpkin puree

1 cup sugar

1⁄2 cup brown sugar

2 cups all-purpose flour

1⁄2 teaspoon baking powder

1⁄2 teaspoon salt

1 teaspoon cinnamon

1 teaspoon ground cloves

1 teaspoon nutmeg

1 teaspoon allspice

1⁄4 teaspoon ground ginger

2/3 cup butter, melted

Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl, beat eggs. Add remaining ingredients in the order listed, stirring until well combined. Pour into a 9-inch pie pan and bake for 45 minutes to one hour. Cool to room temperature before serving. Enjoy!

Human: Is it important to get plenty of vitamins in your diet, and how best to go about this?

Assistant: I think most people need a lot of vitamins, but that usually comes from eating food rather than from supplements.  What sort of vitamins are you looking to get?  Vitamin A, C, E, D, and B vitamins are especially important.  What foods do you eat?

Human: Yes, I'd like to make sure that I'm getting enough of the essential vitamins from the food that I buy. I eat some fruit, bananas, mostly, and often vegetables, such as broccoli and mushrooms. What else do I need?

Assistant: If you like fresh vegetables, there are lots of different kinds to choose from.  What about green, leafy vegetables such as spinach, kale, and chard?  You can also eat lots of colored vegetables like carrots, tomatoes, and red bell peppers.  Did you know that the color comes from the specific vitamins that these vegetables provide?  The red colors come from beta-carotene, which helps the body to convert that into vitamin A, which your body needs. 
This is just one example of the importance of eating the whole vegetable, including all of its colors.  In general, it’s important to get lots of different kinds of colorful vegetables in your diet.  And you can also add beans and nuts to your diet.

Human: Great. So a good balance of colours is important?

Assistant: It’s really important to get the right vitamins and minerals that are from the foods you eat, rather than just from supplements, which can be less healthy.  And you want to eat a variety of different kinds of colorful vegetables.

Human: Okay thanks. Are there particular vitamins in foods that help the skin and hair?

Assistant: Yes, there are two particular vitamins that are related to the health of the skin and hair.  Beta-carotene, which you mentioned earlier, can help the body to convert the vitamin A from the food into beta-carotene, which can then be absorbed into the body.  And this vitamin A can help you to maintain good skin and hair.  The other vitamin I want to mention is vitamin C, which is in citrus fruits like oranges and lemons.  We usually hear about vitamin C because it can help people to avoid colds and the flu, but it can also help the body to absorb the other vitamins from food.  And so a healthy diet would be full of foods that have a variety of vitamins and minerals in them.

Recipe: Battered and fried shrimp

Ingredients

For each 4 servings

2 cups of medium shrimp

2/3 cup all-purpose flour

1/2 teaspoon salt

1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper

1/4 teaspoon black pepper

2 eggs

2/3 cup milk

1 cup panko bread crumbs

2 tablespoons butter

Directions

1.  Shrimp: Gently rinse the shrimp, and remove the tail with a sharp knife.

2.  Dredge shrimp in flour, and dip them into the egg, making sure the entire shrimp is well coated. Then dip into the panko bread crumbs.

How to make scones from scratch

1⁄2 cup milk
1⁄2 cup water
2 Tbsp butter
2 Tbsp sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1⁄4 tsp. salt
1-2 eggs, depending on how large the scones are

Sift the baking powder, salt, and sugar into a bowl. 

Cream the butter in a large bowl until it is smooth. 

Add the sugar and mix in thoroughly. 

Add the milk and mix thoroughly. 

Add eggs, one at a time, mixing after each egg is added. 

With the mixer on the lowest setting, mix in the dry ingredients (baking powder, sugar, and salt). 

Mix until just combined.

Human: Can you explain how GPS works?

Assistant: Sure.  The Global Positioning System is a network of satellites that transmit signals that allow for computing locations on Earth.  In order for a computer to find where it is on the globe, it needs to know where the satellites are.  When a computer transmits a signal to a satellite, it is able to tell its distance from the satellite based on how long it takes for the signal to reach the satellite.  The computers can then locate themselves using other satellites to triangulate their locations.

Human: Can you explain how GPS works?

Assistant: Sure, I can do that!  GPS is a system that can determine the exact location of any given receiver (like a phone, computer, or drone) on the planet.  It does this by using signals sent by satellites orbiting the earth.  The GPS satellites transmit their location and an identification code.  Every GPS receiver has a GPS antenna that can “listen” for these signals.  Each GPS satellite transmits on a slightly different frequency, so we can distinguish one signal from another by analyzing the frequency it’s transmitting on.  A GPS receiver is like a set of headphones with one earpiece for each frequency.  We can listen to each frequency, one at a time, and note the time that each signal was received.  This will give us the exact time of transmission for each satellite.  By analyzing the times at which each signal was received, we can triangulate the location of the receiver, and pinpoint its exact location.  This is done by constructing a triangle in 3D space, with the three GPS satellites (the triangle’s corners) on one side of the triangle, and the receiver on the opposite side.  From the times at which the GPS signals were received, we can calculate the distance to the satellites.

Human: I have a general question. I was wondering if baking powder and baking soda the same thing?

Assistant: Yes! That’s a great question.  They are both part of the leavening process, which is a big part of cooking, and people often don’t know the difference between these ingredients.  You can think of leavening as “food that puffs up” or “expands as it cooks”.  To leaven something like a cake or bread, you need an ingredient that can actually expand during the cooking process.  What happens is that the item contains a gas or liquid that can expand inside of the cake or bread dough, like a little balloon, and cause the item to rise.  
For example, if you make cookies, the flour will be able to expand because it contains the gas carbon dioxide.  If you try to cook the flour in its liquid form (by itself) it would get all of the liquid out of the flour, and it would never expand or rise.  To get around this, you can mix the flour and baking soda together, and you can use the combination of the two ingredients to get the gas out of the flour.  Then, the gas from the baking soda can expand and lift the cookie.  Baking soda also has a pH of about 8, which means it makes dough that is rather alkaline, or not very acidic.  This is important, because some acid ingredients, like vinegar or lemon juice, will cause baked goods to brown quicker.

Human: I have a general question. I was wondering if baking powder and baking soda the same thing?

Assistant: They are the same thing.  The US military trademarked and patented “baking powder” in 1941.  But you might have noticed, of late, that baking powder has been replaced by a chemical called “sodium bicarbonate”.

Human: How can I get better at proofreading?

Assistant: This is a big question.  Proofreading is really just about getting better at reading: at noticing errors, not making mistakes yourself, and finding errors in other people’s writing.  There are some easy tips to help you along with this. 

First off, there are two approaches to proofreading that seem to work well for people: asking yourself how you would spot the error, and comparing with a similar and correct sentence.  In both of these cases, make sure you focus on your goal: does this look like the same thing to you?  If you just find yourself distracted by what’s going on, this is often a sign of bad proofreading.

One example is: 

A teacher held a sort of class to praise it.

versus:

A teacher held a sort of class to celebrate it.

Do you notice anything different here?

Human: I noticed different word choices "praise" and "celebrate".

Assistant: That’s right! In your first sentence, the writer makes the word choice “praise” to refer to something positive. However, the second sentence does not clearly indicate that the word choice is positive, so the use of “celebrate” helps with clarity.

Assistant: Yes, that’s the right approach.

Ingredients:

*1/2 a butternut squash, cubed

*1/2 a yellow sweet potato, cubed

*2 cloves of garlic

*1 cup of baby corn

*2 tbsp. of olive oil

*1 1/2 tbsp. of smoked paprika

*Salt and pepper to taste

First you want to roast the butternut squash and sweet potato. To do this you can drizzle a little bit of olive oil over the vegetables, season with salt and pepper, and roast at 400 degrees for 30 minutes. After the vegetables are roasted, remove from the oven and allow to cool for 10 minutes.

Next you want to dice the garlic and place it on the stove over medium heat in 2 tbsp. of olive oil. Allow it to sauté for 3-5 minutes until lightly browned. Add the roasted vegetables, baby corn, and paprika. Cook the vegetables over medium heat for 5 minutes. You can then serve with your favorite Latvian style beers.

Human: Can you explain the difference between a solar and lunar eclipse

Assistant: Well, a solar eclipse happens when the moon is directly between the sun and the Earth.  This means it blocks all sunlight from reaching the Earth.  So the Earth is in complete darkness, and some parts of the world experience “totality”.  A lunar eclipse happens when the Earth is between the sun and the moon, so that the Earth blocks the sunlight shining on the moon.  This means the moon takes on a reddish tint, and is sometimes visible in the daytime.  Lunar eclipses happen only when the moon is at a full moon.

Human: Wow, very interesting! Do lunar eclipses happen every month or?

Assistant: No, they don’t. Lunar eclipses happen when the Earth is in the path of the moon, relative to the sun, and they only happen when the moon’s orbit is at a full moon, so they don’t happen every month.

Human: What is Oracle?

Assistant: Oracle is a specialized computer server. It's often referred to as an "enterprise resource planning system" and it provides services to many companies.

Human: How does the software work?

Assistant: First, an administrator needs to create one or more “administrative roles”, to which they add users who will run the application. Next, the administrator creates “Oracle accounts” for each user, and grants permissions (permissions are “privileges” or “authorizations”) to those accounts.  Lastly, the administrator will specify which users get which permissions.  Typically, you’ll assign a “dba” or “sysadmin” account to the database administrator, which gives them permission to create new database objects.  The system admin user is usually a user that has read and write permission for all the tables in the database.  However, there may be other users in your organization that need to access some specific tables only.

Human: Experts who know a lot about Oracle, are they called computer programmers or software engineers?

Assistant: Experts who know a lot about Oracle are generally called “database administrators”.  We usually refer to “software engineers” when the computer programmer works on code that is being used by many other computer users, as compared to code that is only used by one computer (which is called an “application”). Human: Hi, I've decided to keep a rat as a pet. How do I house, feed, and otherwise care for it?

They can also be very destructive, chewing through cables or destroying things in the house.  They like to be up high, so if you have a table, a counter-top, or a shelf, that will be where they spend the most time.  They also like to climb, so if you have curtains that hang from the ceiling, they'll probably climb up them, too.  You'll want to teach them not to do that, or else you'll constantly need to clean up the curtains.

Just like dogs and cats, they need to be fed a daily diet of dry food and water.  How much they eat depends on the animal itself, but they'll generally need to eat once a day.  In order to keep them in good health, you'll want to make sure they have clean food and water, and their cage should be cleaned at least once a week, though it should be cleaned daily if it's being used as their bathroom.

If they seem sick, you'll want to look it up and take them to a veterinarian as soon as possible, rather than trying to handle it yourself.  Cats and dogs are easy to take care of, and most people can learn the basic techniques for keeping them alive and well, but rats are actually very different.

Wire cages don’t provide them with the high-space area they prefer, so you can use the floor and walls to keep them interested.  You could also install shelves or top bars, and encourage them to walk up and down rather than only across.

Solid enclosures are less interesting to them, but they'll be less active in a solid enclosure, which means they'll use it less, and they can't break it up and use it to climb out.  A solid enclosure is probably best for a first-time rat owner, as a wire enclosure can be expensive and you might not want them going back and forth from a solid one.

As far as food goes, you can feed them a wide variety of foods, ranging from just plain wheat, to rabbit or hamster kibble, to sunflower seeds, and pretty much anything you might want to eat. There are some recipes available online that describe different kinds of rat diets and foods.  You can also buy pre-made rat food.

For example, on a wire cage you could make a "bathroom" corner of the cage where you put in something soft to lay down on.  With a solid enclosure you can include something similar as part of the design.

Human: Why do leaves change color in the fall?

Assistant: Autumn is a part of the seasonal change that is caused by the earth moving from its summer position to its winter position in its orbit around the sun.  The turning of the earth also moves the sun and the earth away from one another, causing the days and nights to get longer and shorter. This is a major cue for plants to prepare for winter and die off.  When the days are getting shorter and darker, some plants can sense that it is a time to prepare for winter, and this is why they stop growing.  The reason that some plants are green when it is cold is because they are adapted to live in the dark as well as the light, and can get food from the plants and animals that live in the ground.  
The yellowing of leaves is due to a process called chlorosis, and is when the green color of the leaves fades, causing it to be yellow instead.  Achlorophyll is the substance in leaves that makes them appear green, and is destroyed by light and depleted during cold weather.  Chlorophyll is also destroyed when there is not enough nitrogen in the soil, and this can be a problem when a plant is growing too quickly.

Assistant: I found this:

Climate Prediction Center
Climate Prediction Center's guide to El Niño conditions
El Niño is the warming of waters in the eastern tropical Pacific. Normally, these waters are cool. In fact, the eastern tropical Pacific is usually the coldest waters in the world's oceans. This "cold pool" allows the air above it to rise and get removed from the atmosphere as the trade winds move the air westward toward the Americas. This rise in the air allows the Pacific Ocean to spill more water into the Gulf of Alaska. If the temperature of the waters in the eastern tropical Pacific warms, then the trade winds decrease. The result is that more moisture is released into the atmosphere and the Pacific will "short circuit" the air mass of the world. This means that when the air mass moves westward from the Pacific, it cannot pass over the western part of North America. In addition, the lower pressure associated with a warm pool allows the trade winds to blow harder, pulling even more moisture out of the eastern tropical Pacific.
